book.geneticsresequenced.guide.getting_s: Getting Genes is a rather involved process.

First, you'll need the [Scraper](entry://items/scraper). This tool can be used on entities to collect [Organic Matter](entry://items/organic_matter) from them. \
  \
The Organic Matter will have the entity's type attached. This is what decides what Genes you can get from it.

[#](AA00AA)Genes[#]() can be taken from mobs to [#](00AAAA)harness their abilities[#](). \
  \
For example, Sheep have the [#](00AAAA)Wooly[#]() Gene. If you inject this into yourself, you will be able to be sheared for wool! \
  \
To see a full list of Genes, [#](00AAAA)see here[#]().

Each Gene page in the book will say what the Gene does, and how to obtain it. \
  \
Some Genes can even be given to mobs!
book.geneticsresequenced.guide.items.ant:
The [#](AA00AA)Anti-Field Orb[#]() allows you to [#](00AAAA)temporarily disable certain Genes[#](). \
  \
Specifically, it disables the [Item Attraction Field](entry://genes/item_attraction_field) and [XP Attraction Field](entry://genes/xp_attraction_field) when enabled.
The Anti-Field Orb can be toggled by right-clicking it while held.
book.geneticsresequenced.guide.items.cel:
[#](AA00AA)Cells[#]() are a recipe ingredient used in the creation of [DNA Helices](entry://items/dna_helix). \
  \
This is done in the [DNA Extractor](entry://blocks/dna_extractor).

Each entity has its own Cell, which can be processed into a [DNA Helix](entry://items/dna_helix) of the entity's type. \
  \
You can see the Cell's entity type in the item's tooltip.
book.geneticsresequenced.guide.items.pot:
[#](AA00AA)Potions of Cell Growth[#](), like Organic Substrate, has no effect when imbibed. It's more of a crafting ingredient than a potion. \
  \
These recipes allow you to [#](00AAAA)improve your odds of getting certain rare Genes[#]().
A [Cell](entry://items/cell) can be brewed into the Potion of Cell Growth to [#](00AAAA)set the Potion to the Cell's entity type[#]().
From there, certain entity types have recipes to make [Genetically Modified Cells](entry://items/gmo_cell), which are guaranteed to give a specific Gene.

A low-temperature Advanced Incubator takes a very long time, but can be accelerated using Overclockers. \
  \
Unfortunately, Overclockers lower your chances of success. Chorus Fruits increase it back, though!
book.geneticsresequenced.guide.name: Big Book of Genetics
book.geneticsresequenced.guide.tooltip: A guide to all things genetic

modonomicon.gui.bookmarks.info:
To navigate to a bookmark, click on it in this list.
\
\
To add a bookmark, open an entry and click the "Add Bookmark" button on the bottom right.
\
\
To remove a bookmark, navigate to it and click the "Remove Bookmark" button on the bottom right.
